content: **knitted shawl in drops babymerino and drops kid-silk the piece is worked sideways with moss stitch ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern bm-111 yarn group a + a or c ------------------------------------------------------- **size** height measured down middle = approx 20 cm width measured along top = approx 116 cm **yarn** drops baby merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g colour 08 cerise and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 25 g colour 13 cerise **needles** drops circular needle size 5 mm length 40 cm **knitting gauge ** 17 stitches in width and 28 row in height with moss stitch and 1 strand of each quality = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size -------------------------------------------------------
